Email Signup

We send out an email each month to let you know who is speaking and what the topic is going to be. If you would like us to email you type in your address below and click subscribe.

About us

The Dallas C# SIG meets monthly on the 1st Thursday from 6:30pm to 8:30pm at the Improving offices in Plano, TX. Subscribe to receive email notifications about monthly meetings.
